ability.name: Shuriken Flip
ability.description: Throws a shuriken at the target, dealing magic damage and marking them. Dashes away and then returns to deal additional magic damage.

ability.name: Stance Dance
ability.description: Switches between Chains and Fists stances, altering attack range and effects. Chains: Gains increased range and deals bonus physical damage. Fists: Gains omnivamp and increased attack speed.

ability.name: Obsolete Technology
ability.description: Reduces incoming damage and emits sparks every second, dealing magic damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Static Field
ability.description: Gains a shield and shocks the nearest enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their damage output.

ability.name: Air Raid
ability.description: Calls in an airship to drop bombs over enemies, dealing physical damage and reducing their defenses.

ability.name: Precision Protocol
ability.description: Kicks the target, dealing adaptive damage and healing for a portion of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Noxious Blast
ability.description: Blasts the target with magic damage. Every third cast, spreads miasma to additional enemies, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Missile Barrage
ability.description: Locks onto a target and unleashes a barrage of missiles, dealing physical damage and reducing armor.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Spins, dealing physical damage to adjacent enemies and applying a bleed effect over time.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description: Passively empowers attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Can activate to spin an empowered axe.

ability.name: Chemically Charged
ability.description: Heals over time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies each second. Upon completion, deals burst magic damage to all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Chronobreak
ability.description: Releases afterimages towards the target, dealing physical damage. Synergizes with Vi for additional effects.

ability.name: Spider Form
ability.description: Transforms into a spider, gaining bonus stats and abilities.

ability.name: Mystic Shot
ability.description: Fires a shot at the target, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Powder Keg
ability.description: Sets up a powder keg that explodes after a delay, dealing area damage.

ability.name: Judgment
ability.description: Spins rapidly, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
ability.description: Deploys a turret that attacks enemies, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Tentacle Smash
ability.description: Slams her target with a tentacle, dealing magic damage and healing herself for a portion of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Bladesurge
ability.description: Dashes to her target, dealing physical damage and healing herself. If the target is below a certain health threshold, the cooldown is refreshed.

ability.name: Mercury Cannon/Mercury Hammer
ability.description: Starts in Cannon form, gaining ranged attacks and bonus attack speed. After a set number of attacks, switches to Hammer form, gaining melee attacks that deal bonus magic damage and a shield.

ability.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
ability.description: Fires a rocket that explodes on impact, dealing magic damage to the target and nearby enemies. The damage increases with distance traveled.

ability.name: Living Artillery
ability.description: Launches a projectile at a random enemy, dealing magic damage. If the target is below a certain health threshold, the damage is increased.

ability.name: Sigil of Malice
ability.description: Projects a sigil onto her target, dealing magic damage. After a short delay, the sigil detonates, dealing additional magic damage.

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.description: Calls down a solar beam on a random enemy, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies within the area.

ability.name: Luminous Strike
ability.description: Unleashes a burst of light in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and reducing their attack speed.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description: Fires a laser in a line, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit. If she gets a takedown, refunds a portion of her mana.

ability.name: Nether Grasp
ability.description: Suppresses the target, dealing magic damage over time and applying grievous wounds.

ability.name: Realm of Death
ability.description: Banishes the target to the Death Realm, dealing magic damage and stealing a portion of their stats for the duration.

ability.name: Soul Shackles
ability.description: Links herself to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and stunning them after a short delay if they remain within range.

ability.name: Tidal Wave
ability.description: Summons a massive tidal wave that knocks up and slows enemies it passes through, dealing magic damage.

ability.name: Paranoia
ability.description: Reduces the vision of all enemies and dashes to the lowest health enemy, dealing physical damage and fearing them.

ability.name: Consume
ability.description: Nunu commands Willump to bite a target, dealing magic damage and healing himself. If the target is below a certain health threshold, the damage and healing are increased.

ability.name: Explosive Charge
ability.description: Throws a grenade at the target, dealing magic damage and applying a debuff that reduces healing received.

ability.name: Attract and Repel
ability.description: Links herself to an ally, granting them a shield. Upon breaking or reactivation, stuns nearby enemies and deals magic damage.

ability.name: Toxic Wave
ability.description: Releases a toxic wave, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line and applying a poison that reduces healing.

ability.name: Chemical Slam
ability.description: Slams the ground, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing their attack speed.

ability.name: The Equalizer
ability.description: Deploys a line of rockets that deal magic damage over time to enemies standing in the area.

ability.name: Flame Burst
ability.description: Unleashes a burst of flame, dealing magic damage to enemies in a cone and applying a burn effect.

ability.name: Haymaker
ability.description: Delivers a powerful punch, dealing true damage to the target and physical damage to enemies behind them.

ability.name: Power Fist
ability.description: Charges her gauntlet and punches the target, dealing magic damage and stunning them.

ability.name: Unstable Concoction
ability.description: Injects an ally with a concoction, granting them bonus attack speed and causing them to explode upon death, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

ability.name: Poison Trail
ability.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind him, dealing magic damage over time to enemies standing in it.

ability.name: Shadow Assault
ability.description: Dashes through enemies, dealing physical damage and becoming untargetable during the dash.

ability.name: Shield Bash
ability.description: Raises his shield, reducing incoming damage and dealing magic damage to enemies in front of him.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent
ability.description: Transforms into a dragon, gaining bonus health and dealing magic damage to enemies around him.

ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description: Fires a massive cannonball at the target, dealing magic damage and knocking them back.

ability.name: Subjugate
ability.description: Drains the target's health, dealing magic damage and healing himself for a portion of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Pick a Card
ability.description: Throws a card at a random enemy, dealing magic damage and applying a random effect based on the card color.

ability.name: Spray and Pray
ability.description: Gains increased attack damage and attack speed for a duration. His attacks become piercing, dealing damage to all enemies in a line.

ability.name: Fear Beyond Death
ability.description: Fires a drill at the target, dealing magic damage and pulling them towards him if they are below a health threshold, executing them if they reach him.

ability.name: Crushing Blow
ability.description: Slams his target, dealing physical damage and stunning them for a short duration.

ability.name: Personal Space
ability.description: Shields herself for a few seconds. When the shield expires, it deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.

ability.name: Assault and Battery
ability.description: Targets the farthest enemy, charging towards them and knocking aside all enemies in her path. Upon reaching the target, deals physical damage and knocks them up.

ability.name: Chaos Storm
ability.description: Summons a singularity at a location that zaps the nearest enemy, dealing magic damage over time and reducing their magic resistance.

ability.name: Vault Breaker
ability.description: Charges up and then dashes forward, dealing physical damage to all enemies in her path and knocking them up.

ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Deals magic damage to the target and heals himself for a portion of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.description: Leaps to the lowest health enemy, suppressing them and dealing magic damage over time. Heals himself for a portion of the damage dealt.

ability.name: Ultrashock Laser
ability.description: Fires a laser that damages and slows the first enemy hit. If the target is already slowed, the laser deals bonus damage.

ability.name: Bouncing Bomb
ability.description: Throws a bomb at a random enemy, dealing magic damage to the target and nearby enemies.

ability.name: Paddle Star
ability.description: Fires a star that travels in a line, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit. If the star doesn't hit an enemy, it returns to her and empowers her next attack to deal bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Grasping Roots
ability.description: Sends vines towards the current target, stunning them and dealing magic damage. Smaller vines seek out additional enemies, dealing magic damage to them.

traits.name: Academy
traits.description: The Academy sponsors items that grant Health and Damage Amp. Units holding these items gain double the amount.

breakpoints.effect: 2% Health Damage Amp; gain 1 sponsored item
3% Health Damage Amp; gain 1 sponsored item
4% Health Damage Amp; gain 1 sponsored item

traits.name: Artillerist
traits.description: Every few attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals a percentage of their Attack Damage to enemies around the target. They also gain bonus Attack Damage.

breakpoints.effect: 50% Attack Damage, launch a rocket every 5 attacks that deals double damage

traits.name: Automata
traits.description: Automata units gain crystals when dealing damage. After collecting 20, they explode for damage and gain Armor/Magic Resist.

traits.name: Black Rose
traits.description: Summons Sion, whose power grows based on Black Rose unit star levels. Sion can be freed and grows stronger with each unit.

breakpoints.effect: Sion is freed after 5 casts or when below 65% health
Sion heals to full Health upon release
Sion returns to life with full power

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.description: Ambushers’ abilities can critically strike, and they gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

breakpoints.effect: 20% Critical Strike Chance and 10% Critical Strike Multiplier
30% Critical Strike Chance and 20% Critical Strike Multiplier
40% Critical Strike Chance and 30% Critical Strike Multiplier

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.description: Bruisers gain bonus maximum Health. If there are multiple Bruisers, this bonus is increased.

traits.name: Conqueror
traits.description: Conquerors’ takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot! Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 3% for each War Chest opened.

traits.name: Firelight
traits.description: Firelights dash around the board and gain infinite attack range and heal a percent of the damage taken.

traits.name: Form Swapper
traits.description: Form Swappers change their stats and abilities based on their positioning. When placed in the front two rows, they gain increased durability. When placed in the back two rows, they gain increased damage amplification.

traits.name: Enforcer
traits.description: At the start of combat, Enforcers gain a shield and increased damage amplification. They mark the highest Health enemy units as 'Wanted.' When a Wanted enemy is defeated, Enforcers receive a significant attack speed boost. At the highest trait level, Enforcers can confiscate all enemy items at the start of combat.

breakpoints.effect: ALL enemies; 100% Shield, 150% Damage Amplification; Combat Start: Confiscate all enemy items!

traits.name: Dominator
traits.description: At the start of combat, Dominators gain a shield for 15 seconds. When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

traits.name: Chem-Baron
traits.description: Chem-Barons gain Shimmer based on their current health. At high Shimmer levels, they receive powerful bonuses.

breakpoints.effect: Gain 1 Shimmer per second; at 50 Shimmer, receive a random item
Gain 2 Shimmer per second; at 50 Shimmer, receive a random item and 10% increased damage
Gain 3 Shimmer per second; at 50 Shimmer, receive a random item, 10% increased damage, and 10% damage reduction

traits.name: Pit Fighter
traits.description: Pit Fighters gain omnivamp, true damage, and healing when dropping below a health threshold.

breakpoints.effect: 10% omnivamp; heal for 15% of max health when below 50% health
20% omnivamp; heal for 25% of max health when below 50% health
30% omnivamp; heal for 35% of max health when below 50% health

traits.name: Rebel
traits.description: Rebels gain 12% max Health. After your team loses 25% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.

breakpoints.effect: 40% Attack Damage and Ability Power, 12% Health
45% Attack Damage and Ability Power, 15% Health, and Stun all enemies for 2 seconds
The smoke signal triggers at Combat Start and every 12 seconds

traits.name: Quickstriker
traits.description: Quickstrikers gain attack speed based on the target’s missing health and dash after killing a target.

breakpoints.effect: 10% attack speed per 10% missing health; dash after kill
15% attack speed per 10% missing health; dash after kill
20% attack speed per 10% missing health; dash after kill

traits.name: Scrap
traits.description: At the start of combat, components held by Scrap units are randomly completed into full items for that combat. Additionally, Scrap units gain a shield for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.

breakpoints.effect: All components and full items become lucky! 65 Shield

traits.name: Sentinel
traits.description: Sentinels provide armor and magic resistance to the team, tripled for Sentinels.

breakpoints.effect: 10 Armor & Magic Resist; tripled for Sentinels
20 Armor & Magic Resist; tripled for Sentinels
40 Armor & Magic Resist; tripled for Sentinels

traits.name: Sniper
traits.description: Snipers deal bonus damage based on the distance between them and their target.

traits.name: Sorcerer
traits.description: Sorcerers increase team ability power, with additional bonuses for Sorcerer units.

traits.name: Visionary
traits.description: Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more Mana.

traits.name: Watcher
traits.description: Watchers gain Durability, increased while above 50% Health.

traits.name: Banished Mage
traits.description: The first time you would be eliminated, if Mel has cast 12 times during player combat this game, she saves you and you remain alive. Afterwards, Mel permanently gains 10% Damage Amp.

traits.name: Emissary
traits.description: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries. Emissaries gain additional Health and Damage Amplification.

breakpoints.effect: Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain 200 Health and 20% Damage Amplification.

traits.name: Experiment
traits.description: Gain Laboratory hexes on your board. At the start of combat, Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus bonus Health.

traits.name: Family
traits.description: Family members support each other, reducing damage taken and increasing damage dealt.
